openai-python
=============

# Available modules


The overview below shows which openai-python installations are available per HPC-UGent Tier-2 cluster, ordered based on software version (new to old).

To start using openai-python, load one of these modules using a `module load` command like:

```shell
module load openai-python/1.39.0-foss-2023b
```
